name: Cosmic Chaos (JuiceTin)
description:
Cosmic Chaos

*This game is made for 8 players and is played with 4 controllers.*
Each player gets half of a controller, and the other person sharing the controller with you is on the other team, so watch out!

Collect gold space pellets in a race against time and your opponents to be the Ultimate Space Pirate! 

Bring gold into your team's zone to give your team a multiplier, but the only way you get points is by bringing the gold into your specified zone.

There can only be one Ultimate Space Pirate, so make sure to keep an eye on who might be stealing your loot!

A Game by:

Programmers:
Nolan Grant - nolangrant.itch.io
Justin McKague - juicetin.itch.io

Art:
Martin Gallagher

Music:
Alexander Kehn
